summary: I started playing TES series back when Morrowind was released on the original Xbox. It was the best one in the series in my opinion. I enjoyed how when you dropped gold or found gold in the world space, it was stack and depending on the amount, the size of the stack grew. Well, I want to bring that to Skyrim. I have replaced the various coin purses
descriptionHtml: I started playing TES series back when Morrowind was released on the original Xbox. It was the best one in the series in my opinion. I enjoyed how when you dropped gold or found gold in the world space, it was stack and depending on the amount, the size of the stack grew. Well, I want to bring that to Skyrim. I have replaced the various coin purses with stacks of gold. Granted, there are certain locations where this might not seem plausible but I plan to change that.
author: domin8MGS
